Recommended The best breed are the ones in need! Senior Pets Don\'t buy, adopt! Make a difference and contribute today! Shelter pets need your help Near you Adopt a puppy today!
He loves being with his brother squeaky. Both were owner surrender to humane society since owner could not keep because apartment complex would not allow. Escape artist and will look for a way out to run and play! JUMPERS, CAN JUMP HIGH!! She is very smart! She knows sit and shake and is even crate trained! Arthur loves dogs but is not cat tested. She is a dog who wants to please his humans and is very sweet!! She is a very shy girl that will need time to come out of her shell. Loud noises while walking do make her nervous so a confident and experienced owner is important. Since She is nervous with new things. MainActivity ExpandActivity TestActivity
